name: Lithuanian Saltibarsciai (Cold Beet Soup)
author: George  Doyle Gamber
summary: This Lithuanian family recipe from the old country makes an awesome summer soup! Serve with warm Yukon Gold potatoes.
ingredients: 1 large English cucumber - peeled, quartered, and sliced
directions: Place the eggs into a saucepan in a single layer and cover the eggs with water by 1 inch
Cover the saucepan and bring the water to a boil
Remove from the heat and let the eggs stand in the hot water for 15 minutes; drain
Cool the eggs under cold running water in the sink
Pour the buttermilk into a large bowl; add the eggs, beets, cucumber, chives, and dill
Chill in refrigerator for 1 full day before serving
